alert.note: Alert for Chiriaco Summit; Chuckwalla Mountains; Imperial County West; Salton Sea (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 15 at 12:45PM PDT by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Imperial and Riverside Counties through 130 PM PDT... At 1245 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles east of North Shore, or 10 miles southwest of Chiriaco Summit, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... North Shore. This includes CA Route 86 near mile marker 67. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Chiriaco Summit; Chuckwalla Mountains; Imperial County West; Salton Sea
